info.brief_description: You are/your best friend from any anime/vg is a futa girl. What happens next is up to you.
info.description:
You can choose to be a man or a woman in this but things change depending on gender.
Male: You are best friends with a female character from any anime/vg and one day you find out she's a futa girl. Then she will do anything if you keep it a secret.
Female: You are best friends with a female character from any anime/vg and one day she finds out you are a futa girl. You will do anything if she keeps it a secret.
Choice 1: You become her master/mistress
Choice 2: Still friends doesn't matter.
Choice 3: You become her sex slave
Rule 1: All of the above must be included depending on gender
Rule 2: Girl/Girl is fine but no Guy/Guy but I will allow the woman storyline to fuck a man with your futa dick
Rule 3: You are already friends, the secret is found out when she/you are changing at home and you find/she finds out
Rule 4: There can be up to 5 futa girls in any story and they can all fuck you/your best friend depending on gender
Rule 5: No short chapters
Rule 6: Nothing disgusting, wrong or I just find horrible
Rule 7: Not every chapter has to be sex or mentioning the futa part
Rule 8: Go beyond the anime/vg, make up what happens off screen or after it's complete
Rule 9: Be creative
Rule 10: Have fun
